ComicInfo.Penciller: Dan Norton,Mat Broome,Ryan Benjamin,Jeff Rebner,Mat Broome,Ryan Benjamin,Dan Norton,Jeff Rebner
ComicInfo.Summary:
Untitled: Stormwatch mourns the loss of their leader, Battalion. Jackson's brother, Malcolm, takes it especially hard. When Cannon learns that Synergy is going to make Diva the new leader of Stormwatch One, he feels slighted and quits. The team attends Jackson's funeral.
Loose Cannon Part 1: Diva tries to talk Cannon out of quitting Stormwatch but fails.
ComicInfo.Title: Untitled; Loose Cannon Part 1
